description: Docker monitoring with Prometheus and cAdvisor

targets.expr: (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{node="Kubernetes", job="kubernetes-exporter", krake_app_uuid=~"$krake_app", krake_daemon_name=~"$krake_daemon", phase="Running", namespace!~"infra|kube-system"}) / sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{node="Kubernetes", job="kubernetes-exporter", krake_app_uuid=~"$krake_app", krake_daemon_name=~"$krake_daemon", namespace!~"infra|kube-system"})* 100)

time() - avg(container_start_time_seconds{node="Kubernetes", job="kubernetes-cadvisor", krake_app_uuid=~"$krake_app", krake_daemon_name=~"$krake_daemon", container_label_io_kubernetes_container_name!~"POD", container_label_io_kubernetes_pod_namespace!~"infra|kube-system", image!=""}) by (id)
avg(kube_pod_container_info{node="Kubernetes", job="kubernetes-exporter", krake_app_uuid=~"$krake_app", krake_daemon_name=~"$krake_daemon", namespace!~"infra|kube-system"}) by (container_id, image)

sum(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{node="Kubernetes", job="kubernetes-cadvisor", krake_app_uuid=~"$krake_app", krake_daemon_name=~"$krake_daemon", container_label_io_kubernetes_container_name!~"POD", container_label_io_kubernetes_pod_namespace!~"infra|kube-system", image!=""}) by (krake_daemon_name, device)

sum(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{node="Kubernetes", job="kubernetes-cadvisor", krake_app_uuid=~"$krake_app", krake_daemon_name=~"$krake_daemon", container_label_io_kubernetes_container_name!~"POD", container_label_io_kubernetes_pod_namespace!~"infra|kube-system", image!=""}) by (krake_daemon_name, device)

title: Apps
